name: BWBan
description:
BWBan is a version of the classic Sokoban game made with HTML5 game engine PuzzleScript and ported to iOS with PhoneGap.

* runs on every iOS device
* 80 tiny but hard levels
* swipe intuitive controls
* unlimited undos
* playable both in portrait and in landscape mode

Burn your brain with this black and white version of Sokoban called BWBan
